pre_caption: This is a static shot of a scenic sky at either dawn or dusk. The camera remains still, capturing the silhouettes of several trees against a backdrop of dark clouds and colorful streaks from the sun. Two long, thin clouds, possibly contrails, are brightly lit with an orange glow.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
